All homes sport contemporary finishes and modern fittings.\xa0In close proximity to Emaar Business Park, Dubai Media City, Dubai Internet City, and Dubai Marina, The Hills is an ideal destination for families and professionals to unwind in cosy retreat-like homes in the heart of the city.For more information about this property call Tanya\xa0 today\xa0 on +971556928234 | BRN 40819\xa0Company name: A1 Properties LLCRERA ORN: 12095\xa0Address: PO Box 128805, Dubai, UAE\xa0Office phone no: +97143515583Website: www.a1properties.ae']

descriptions:
["DescriptionLIVING CHOICE Real Estate is pleased to present you this premium home at Reva Residences, located in Business Bay, Dubai. 
Apartment Features
• Size: 618 Sq ft.
• One Bedroom Apartment
• Closed kitchen
• Modern style
• Good construction quality & finishes
Advantages
• Complete family entertainment
• Community security
• Indoor and Outdoor Gymnasium and swimming pool
• Children’s play area
• Outdoor courtyard
• Yoga and Meditation area
• Dining and shopping facilities
Payment plan
• Deposit: 10% + 4%
• 2% per month for 20 months
• 50 % on completion
Reva Residence is a 30-storey tower by Damac Properties strategically located in Business Bay and overlooking the Dubai Canal. 
Its prominent location makes it a perfect place for many diverse needs.
• Located in the commercial center of Dubai at Business Bay, an area where dreams come true.  
• Place where luxury, technology and ultimate lifestyle along with contemporary amenity are gathered.
• Easy access to major roads in Dubai such as Jumeirah Road & Sheikh Zayed Road.
• 7 minutes to Burj Khalifa and Dubai Mall
Sounds interesting? Feel free to contact us for more information , we are ready to listen, advise and guide you to find the best option for you.
LIVING CHOICE Real Estate is a RERA certified company whose primary business is to introduce a wide range of real estate brokerage services in Dubai's market. We believe that trust is the key of success, therefore we assure to always provide an outstanding service by putting our client’s interest first and guiding them through the whole process.
*Your Choice, Our Commitment*
www.livingchoice.ae"]

descriptions: ['DescriptionSpringfield Real Estate is pleased to offer this corner residential plot with a view of the Park in Pearl Jumeirah, Dubai.* Plot Size: 10,500 sq ft.* Selling Price: AED 3,360,000.* AED 320 / sqft.With spectacular sea views over the Arabian Gulf and the awe-inspiring Dubai skyline, lays the exclusive residential development of Pearl Jumeirah.The reclaimed island that covers approximately 8.3 million sq. ft. of land will host 7 key residential areas, a Town Center with retail facilities, a unique 2 km promenade, schools, mosques, beaches and waterfront hotels.The size, location and exclusivity of Pearl Jumeira makes it a unique jewel that lies in the heart of Dubai\x92s finest residential district. The place caters to individuals who enjoy the seclusion of a desert island destination yet want to always stay connected to the bustle of the city.You may call our property investment\xa0specialist\xa0Farooq Syed 28603 on +971507751757 / +97144542588 or email info@springfield-re.com for more details.SPRINGFIELD REAL ESTATERERA ORN 11929.']
